attributes.action: MBE or CBE for Bernard Jordan the 89 year old who went AWOL from Care Home
attributes.additional_details: During the D-Day Celebrations Bernard Jordan (89) was told by the care home in Hove he couldn't travel to France. His Response he took himself. True soldier and True Grit. The signers of this petition ask that he be given another medal to wear next year in the New Years Honour's list.
